title: Creative Designer -
desc: Consult with clients to establish the overall look of their project
Establish guidelines for illustrators, fonts, colours and images
Determine the medium best suited to produce the desired product
Prepare sketches, layouts and graphic elements
Co-ordinate all aspects of production for print and channel letter  production.

title: Web Developer/Creative Designer -
desc: Created website layout and user interface using standard HTML/CSS practices.
Managed the company'sdomain and website hosting platform
Responsible for maintaining, expanding and scaling of clients websites.
Created UI design for specialized websites.
Created graphic designs for web, social media ads & banners, print and marketing collaterals as required.
Initiated the print production services when none exist in the company.

title: Graphic designer -
desc: Created books and magazines layouts for companies and associations
Created website and social media ads materials for marketing and promotions
Designed gift materials for wedding, birthday other occasions
Incorporated changes recommended by clients or art directors into final designs
Reviewed designs for errors before printing or publishing them.
Prepared files using standard colour and text format before sending to the press
Maintained constant communication with printing houses.
